definition: to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Party B shall still have the ownership of the equipment until Party B is paid in full.
sentences.chinese: 甲方未付清全款前，设备的所有权仍归乙方所有。

sentences.english: The balance shall be paid 45 days before the opening of the trade fair.
sentences.chinese: 剩余展位费在博览会开幕前45天内付清。

sentences.english: No shares of stock against which the corporation holds unpaid claim shall be transferable in the books of the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 购股款未付清的股份不得在公司登记册中过户。

sentences.english: I'm at my wits end worrying about how to pay the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我真没了主意，不知如何才能付清这笔帐。

sentences.english: He has a habit of planking out the whole cost all at once.
sentences.chinese: 他习惯于将全部费用一次付清。

sentences.english: A form of mortgage where no prepayments are allowed on the principal amount of the mortgage during a given period of time.
sentences.chinese: 在一个特定时期内，不允许提前付清本金的贷款形式。

sentences.english: The money will be invested by Italy over a 25-year period. Sabina Castelfranco reports from Rome.
sentences.chinese: 意大利将在25年内以投资的形式付清这笔钱。

sentences.english: The rent is payable monthly in one lump sum, before the tenth day of each month.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金一次支付，必须于租赁期每月前十天付清。

sentences.english: The money will be invested by Italy over a 25-year period.
sentences.chinese: 意大利将在25年内以投资的形式付清这笔钱。

sentences.english: Our ship was requested to clear the customs and pay the due tolls.
sentences.chinese: 要求我船办理结关手续，付清过境费。

sentences.english: The payment is due today, so I hope you'll dab down at once.
sentences.chinese: 这笔款今天到期，因此我希望你立即付清。

sentences.english: We have several hundred pounds owing on our car.
sentences.chinese: 我们的车还欠几百英镑未付清。

sentences.english: They spread the payments out over three years.
Many will be unable to pay off the loan and risk becoming "zombie debtors".
sentences.chinese: 许多人将无法付清贷款，有可能会沦为僵尸负债人。

sentences.english: The amount show, plus interest, is due within 30 days.
sentences.chinese: 在30天之内应把所列的本和利息都付清。

sentences.english: You can't pay off $25K in debt in a week.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能在一周的时间内付清两万五千美元。

definition: to pay back in full/to redeem a debt
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
